```{r}
library(plotly)
studenttoteacherratiovis <- read_excel(paste0(getwd(), "/studenttoteacherratiolcps.xlsx"),skip=0,col_names=TRUE)

teacherstudentratiovis <- plot_ly(
  type = 'table',
  columnwidth = c(100, 100),
  columnorder = c(0, 1),
  header = list(
    values = c("School","Student to Teacher Ratio"),
    align = c("center", "center"),
    line = list(width = 1, color = 'black'),
    fill = list(color = c("grey", "grey")),
    font = list(family = "Arial", size = 14, color = "white")
  ),
  cells = list(
    values = rbind(studenttoteacherratiovis$Schools, studenttoteacherratiovis$`Student to Teacher Ratio`),
    align = c("center", "center"),
    line = list(color = "black", width = 1),
    font = list(family = "Arial", size = 12, color = c("black"))
  ))

teacherstudentratiovis
```
